function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential future pandemics","Impact":"Large-scale illness, economic disruption","Mitigation":"Invest in pandemic preparedness, public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Data analytics, smart technologies, crisis management tools","People":"Urban populations, city organizations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Recurring natural disasters (earthquakes, floods, droughts)","Impact":"Property damage, loss of life, economic disruption","Mitigation":"Invest in resilient infrastructure, disaster response planning","Technologies":"Smart communications, sustainable energy systems, resilient water networks","People":"City residents, businesses, emergency responders","Owner":"City government, infrastructure organizations"},{"Description":"Disruptions caused by humans (strikes, cyber attacks, terrorism)","Impact":"Infrastructure damage, economic disruption, security threats","Mitigation":"Invest in cybersecurity measures, crisis management protocols","Technologies":"Security technologies, crisis management tools","People":"City residents, businesses, government organizations","Owner":"City government, security organizations"}]}
